unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for sourcing fresh talent. We at ABC Corp actively engage with IIT Delhi and other premier institutions. This year, we aim to recruit bright minds for our Bangalore and Mumbai offices. Reminds me of "3 Idiots," only this time, we're offering placements! Our package starts at Rs. 8,00,000 per annum. Interviews begin on 15th August, 2024. Hope to see you there!
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for sourcing fresh talent. We at A B C Corp actively engage with I I T Delhi and other premier institutions.
